title: 'Worst destruction I've seen is in Borodyanka'
subtitle: Police say there could be hundreds of people buried under rubble of blocks destroyed by Russian attacks.
content: The town of Borodyanka may have faced some the worst attacks since Russia launched its invasion of Ukraine. . Police in the town, which is about 60km (40 miles) north-west of Kyiv, say there could be hundreds of people buried under the rubble of civilian apartment blocks destroyed in Russian shelling attacks.. The BBC's Jeremy Bowen met people returning to Borodyanka..
